full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 743 Filed 08/10/22 Page 158 of 247 286 LBUVMAX4 Jane - direct MS. MODE: Thank you, your Honor. The government calls Jane. THE COURT: The witness testifying under the pseudonym Jane may come forward. JANE, called as a witness by the Government, having been duly sworn, testified as follows: THE COURT: Please be seated. This witness will be testifying under the pseudonym Jane. Ms. Me, you may proceed. MS. MODE: Thank you, your Honor. And with respect to the Court's order regarding sketch artists, is that now in effect? THE COURT: It is in effect. I've asked the sketch artist not to sketch the exact likeness -- ordered the sketch artist not to depict the exact likeness. And I will ask the witness to please remove your mask. You are in the Plexiglas box with the HEPA filter. Thank you. MS. MODE: Thank you, your Honor. DIRECT EXAMINATION BY MS. MOE: Q. Good afternoon. A. Good afternoon. Q. Just to be clear, are you testifying under the name Jane SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00011930
